root.name: ProtoGalaxy
root.description: OverviewDestroy the aliens in this space shooter with puzzle elements. You can join up with 3 friends to shoot the aliens to pieces or by solving puzzles to destroy them. The game contains 8 levels of mayhem to solve and conquer.The game contains an editor to create your own galaxy's or import galaxy's from other users.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP SP3/Vista/7Processor: 2GHz or equivalent processorMemory: 1GBGraphics: 256MB video ram or better (GeForce 7 series or higher/Radeon X600 series or higher)DirectXÂ®: 9.0cHard Drive: 1GBSound: Windows compatible sound card
